column6: p.r.; P.b.k.; product structure detd. by esr [752174].
p.r.; C.k.; product hydrolyzes to $\ce{.CONH2}$ which disproportionates to formamide and cyanate; reference rate not given; rel. to $k$(.OH + $\ce{Fe(CN)_6^{4-}}$).
p.r.; C.k. (borate buffer); adduct protonates and rearranges to $\ce{.CONH2}$; rel. to $k$($\ce{^{\cdot}OH} + $\ce{SCN^-}$).
